title: "The League of Draven Mode is currently disabled due to excessive amounts of Draven."
body: Thank God! No more disturbing and distracting Draven heads in my Normal games anymore!

replies.body: The heads were disableable. But they turned off the heads 2 days early so maybe urf is coming :D
i think so to casue draven crap ends today and possiblye tommorw urf will come (hopefully unless riot reall does hate us)
its called Draven DAY not Draven Weekend. Idk why people would think its all weekend long.

They turned if off 2 days ahead of its planned deadline date, so that is something weird...
I don't think it's going to to be URF (though, that would be the best April Fool's joke ever, not releasing URF on April Fools, but the day after), but maybe it might be something else? hopefully?

On pvp.net it says that it is a three day long event, so why disable it after one day? The only thing this event has right now are the draven heads on the minions... but ey, maybe riot will surprise us with something
Probably disabled it because of all the negative votes/comments.
no i still see it whenever i play adc

I mean there is something planed out just wait a little bit i mean tonight or this afternoon they'll announce something crazy 
I don't think it's URF but it can be a really awesome gamemode :)
